description: This file defines a React functional component 'Layout' that provides the main page layout including Sidebar, Topbar, and content areas. It manages user session display and logout functionality, and incorporates navigation links.

methods.name: Layout({ children, title, subtitle })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the layout with sidebar and topbar, handling user info and navigation.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling signOut and navigating to login page.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Layout({ children, title, subtitle }) {$/
